about.title: About us
about.subtitle:
International cooperation encompasses 
 more than 100 IT companies, as well as partnerships with
international notorial IT
 organizations, foundations and universities,
such as T-Hub (founded by Microsoft
and the Government of India), IT (Institute of
India's technology), Harvard
University, Stanford University,
MIT, Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.
